scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && aws s3 sync . s3://template-bucket-staging/daily-word-game/$(jq -r .version ./package.json) --delete --exclude '.github/*' --exclude 'node_modules/*' --exclude '.git/*' --exclude '.idea/*'
